title: ID: Serif Caps Titling
content:
Trying to determine this typeface, part of an old logo I have to work with as part of a stationery project. Can’t seem to match it to anything in my Linotype catalogues, old type specimen books, anything. It’s not Goudy, not Centaur...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201172653im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lr-typeface_3504.jpg)

 [‹ D&Ad typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201172653/http:/typophile.com/node/49529 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) The Anti Pizza Face script on shirt - Ariston {Brett J, Patricia} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201172653/http:/typophile.com/node/38137 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Grgs
